thread.title: Michael Keane: Liverpool and Everton hunt Burnley star but Manchester United sell-on clause will become a problem

author: achapman
title: Michael Keane: Liverpool and Everton hunt Burnley star but Manchester United sell-on clause will become a problem
text:
Spanner in Works Michael Keane: Liverpool and Everton hunt Burnley star but Manchester United sell-on clause will become a problem 
Red Devils are entitled to 25 per cent of any future fee if Keane leaves and Burnley may use it as excuse to hike up price By Neil Ashton 30th March 2017, 10:30 pm Updated: 30th March 2017, 10:34 pm
